Summary: slow moving fireball with see thru orb no sound
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were camping out 5 of us when my girl friend saat the hell is that it looked like a ball of fire with a orb moving back and forth it wamoving.g very fast and is wasn't very high in the sky no sound at all. I had my spot light with me and was turning iton and off and it stopped for a few seconds it was really seared.
